Royal_Oak.3100 W. Big Beaver Road:
3100 W. Big Beaver Road in Troy, Michigan, USA, is the former international headquarters of Kmart Corporation. The building, on the northwest side of the intersection of W. Big Beaver Road and Coolidge Highway, used to employ thousands of people, but has been vacant since 2006.
The building was erected in 1969, designed by Smith, Hinchman, and Grylls, Inc.
